Container.Name: TerrariaMobile
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria Mobile and run it.
SERVER PASSWORD: Docker
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files and creates the map!
Update Notice: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.
WEB CONSOLE: You can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9013 (eg: 192.168.1.1:9013) or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please
